sentence.Network_en: Keep your spending on luxuries down to manageable proportions.
sentence.Network_cn: 将你在奢侈品上的花费降至可控范围。

sentence.Network_en: The present flow of refugees was manageable.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前难民的流动尚可控制。

sentence.Network_en: Use conditioner regularly to make your hair soft and manageable.
sentence.Network_cn: 经常使用护发剂来使你的头发柔软而且易于梳理。

entry.tran: 容易管理的;容易对付的
entry.def: Something that is manageable is of a size, quantity, or level of difficulty that people are able to deal with.

example.ex: He will now try to cut down the task to a manageable size...
example.tran: 他现在要努力把任务的规模降至可控的范围。

example.ex: The present flow of refugees was manageable...
example.tran: 目前难民的流动尚可控制。

means.word_mean: 1. easy to handle or use or manage;
2. capable of being managed or controlled

sentences.en: My hair is much more manageable since I had it cut short.
sentences.cn: 自从我把头发剪短以来, 它好梳理多了。
